questions.quote: I'm not goin' there. Didn't he get busted by the Board of Health?
You know at the movies, they show that little ad for the concession stand?
Ohhh. another interesting confrontation. This could be spicy. Yeah, George bring him over.
No he's not right. Al Netchie is not right! Alright I'm canceling the father-son picnic. I don't know what he's gonna do with all that potato salad.
Don't you think that's coming on a little too strong? .. Isn't that like a turn off?
Hey keep your hands to yourself if you know what's good for you.
Yes he can. He controls the means of production. What are you going to do Jerry?
No! You couldn't wait to get back to your little... "conversation".
Course you know there is always the possibility, that she called an audible.
So three dates and she still won't let me play with her toys.
